//notes: we presume that bark sheath is made to roughly the same design as the Armory nylon one

//weight: based on a study published in IAWA Journal
birch bark density (559.3 kg/m3 = 0.5593 g/ml) × volume (253 ml) = 141.5029 g ≈ 142 g

notes: lower trim compared to `sheath` because we assume slightly-bulkier resulting item
modelling the knife as a cylinder due to the shape of the handle
then trimming for blade and other smaller features

the only nylon MOLLE quivers currently or previously on market had PALS webbing *on them*, rather than being able to attach to other PALS webbing
the initial release of this item was not based on any particular quiver, and was simply a way to add a MOLLE-compatible quiver
https://github.com/CleverRaven/Cataclysm-DDA/pull/67155
that said, it may be worth investigating having MOLLE quivers mount on the back webbing, when that becomes modelled
